preHeaderLabel.fieldDescription: Utilized for the primary component text; if it is null or empty, the text's value will be fetched from the API.

isVariantTwo.name: ./isVariantTwo
isVariantTwo.text: Check to show only the variant models section

learnMoreNewTab.fieldDescription: If checked the link will be opened in a new browser tab.

batteryCapacityValuePrefix.fieldDescription: This will be displayed as the prefix for the Battery Capacity Value.(e.g upto)
